external_games.name: The Baseball 2002: Battle Ball Park Sengen

name: The Baseball 2002: Battle Ball Park Sengen
summary: The Baseball 2002 - Battle Ball Park Sengen is Japanese-exclusive sports game. It was announced March 11, 2002 and released on July 11, 2002. It was developed and published by Konami. Beside on the Original Xbox it was also released on Playstation 2. It features all the teams of Japan's professional league and a close tie-in with Nippon Television Network's TV broadcast presentation.
